page.title: 20OLDEST RESIDENTS OLD WINDSOR
page.content:
47 old men and women are cared for at The Manor,Old Windsor, a beautiful 17th century manor house surrounded by lawns and green fields. OLDEST RESIDENT:- Mr.Worlsfold aged 100 years and five months ;he told us that life now was easy compared with when he was a boy .He enjoys watching television and talking wih his 96 year old friend Mr. Charlie Lemon. Mrs Bibb an old lady who lived in India as a child said that there were medicines in India today which were better than many Western ones;she visited India a few years ago and found many changes in the dress of the people who were very Westernised now.
TEXT BY CHILDREN AT KING'S COURT FIRST SCHOOL, OLD WINDSOR
